QuestData.Title: Saving the Serpents
QuestData.Description: Those Oona hozen have gone too far this time.$B$BDo you know what they are doing with wild cloud serpents? Captured hatchlings are forced to fight one another in the pits, for nothing more than the Oona's amusement.$B$BSavages!$B$BIf the young hatchlings learn such aggressive behavior at a young age, they may become violent and corrupted adults. A malicious cloud serpent is not something we want to deal with.$B$BWe must save the hatchlings.
